### 👋 Hi, I’m Weisi
I’m a **data analyst based in Sydney, Australia**, with a former background in pharmacy. <br>

My interests focus on three key areas:  
1. 💻 Coding <br>
2. 📊 Data visualization  <br>
3. 📈 Expanding my knowledge of statistical and analytical methods <br>

Since 2023, I’ve been working with large, linked health administrative datasets across platforms such as SURE, PLIDA, and NHDH. I’m proficient in SAS and R, which I use extensively for data cleaning, statistical modeling, and visualization.

Outside of work, I enjoy exploring art, traveling, and spending quality time with my family.

**Technical Skills:** SAS • R • big data management • Statistical modeling • Visualization <br>
**Professional Interests:** Reproducible Research • Data Visualization • Statistical modeling <br>
